5.056143 - SELECT  COUNT(notes.id) as count from notes where notes.status =0 and notes.user_id_to=14
6.004810 - SELECT orders.id,orders.shop_id,orders.status_id,JSON_UNQUOTE(orders.payment) as payment,JSON_UNQUOTE(orders.order_details) as order_details,orders.gross_price,orders.shipping_cost,orders.created_at,order_status.title as status_title, shop.domain as shop_name  from orders
            LEFT JOIN order_status on order_status.id=orders.status_id
            LEFT JOIN shop on shop.id=orders.shop_id
            where orders.status_id=10   and orders.user_id=14
5.809069 - SELECT * from order_item
            where order_item.order_id IN ('851467','851524')
11.536121 - SELECT *, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(contents, '$.nl')) as contents FROM product WHERE id=296552
5.438089 - SELECT *, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(title, '$.nl')) as title FROM product_meta WHERE product_id=296552 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
5.295992 - SELECT * FROM product_url WHERE product_id=296552 AND lang='nl' ORDER BY id DESC
5.598068 - SELECT *,JSON_UNQUOTE(price) as price FROM product_pricing WHERE product_id=296552 limit 1
5.288124 - SELECT *,JSON_UNQUOTE(measurements) as measurements FROM product_measurements WHERE product_id=296552 limit 1
5.871058 - SELECT * FROM b_2_b WHERE product_id=296552 limit 1
5.556107 - SELECT order_item_attribute.* , attribute.attribute_group_id, attribute.name->>'$.nl' as title from order_item_attribute
                   left join attribute on order_item_attribute.attribute_id = attribute.id
                   where order_item_attribute.order_item_id=258

5.568027 - SELECT attribute.id, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(attribute.name, '$.nl'))  as name,JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(attribute_group.name, '$.nl')) as attribute_group_name FROM attribute LEFT JOIN attribute_group ON attribute.attribute_group_id = attribute_group.id where attribute_group_id =1 order by name
